    • Container

      public Container​(java.lang.String reference, int length, int depth, int height, order.packing.Color color, order.packing.Color edgeColor) throws order.exceptions.BoxException
      Creates an instance of Container.
      Parameters:
      reference - The container's reference.
      length - The container's length.
      depth - The container's depth.
      height - The container's height.
      color - the container's color.
      edgeColor - the container's edge color.
      Throws:
      order.exceptions.BoxException - if any parameter is less or equal to 0.

  • Method Details

    • addItem

      public boolean addItem​(order.packing.IItem item, order.packing.IPosition pos, order.packing.Color color) throws order.exceptions.ContainerException
      Adds a new item to the container considering the given item, position and color.
      Specified by:
      addItem in interface order.packing.IContainer
      Parameters:
      item - item to be packed.
      pos - position in which the item will be placed.
      color - color used for the item.
      Returns:
      true if the item is is added otherwise returns false.
      Throws:
      order.exceptions.ContainerException - if any parameter is null or the container is closed.

    • close

      public void close() throws order.exceptions.ContainerException, order.exceptions.PositionException
      Close the contanier. Before closing the container, a validation procedure is performed.
      Specified by:
      close in interface order.packing.IContainer
      Throws:
      ContainerException2 - if the volume greater than the current volume.
      PositionException2 - if some item is outside (or is overflowing) the container or if some item is overlapping with other item.
      order.exceptions.ContainerException
      order.exceptions.PositionException

    • validate

      public void validate() throws order.exceptions.ContainerException, order.exceptions.PositionException
      Validates the container structure. Considering: if the volume if lesser or equal to the current volume;if all items are inside the container;if non of the items inside the container are overlapping.
      Specified by:
      validate in interface order.packing.IContainer
      Throws:
      ContainerException2 - if the volume greater than the current volume.
      PositionException2 - if some item is outside (or is overflowing) the container or if some item is overlapping with other item.
      order.exceptions.ContainerException
      order.exceptions.PositionException
